short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy a recipe from a URL and paste into Create My Cookbook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cookbook Recipe Copier lets you easily copy recipe details from online recipes into your createmycookbook.com cookbook (Cookbook Recipe Copier is a third-party extension and is not affiliated with Create My Cookbook).

To change the settings, right click on the extension icon and click Options.

Icons made by Freepik (https://www.flaticon.com/authors/freepik) from Flaticon (www.flaticon.com).
